name: Spray deodorant
title: Axe Dark Temptation · Spray deodorant · 48h, 0% aluminum salts

cosmeticInformation.ingredients: Ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Parfum, Zinc Neodecanoate, Isopropyl Myristate, Amyl Cinnamal, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Limonene, Linalool.

usageInformation.additionalInformation: Effective protection against body odor. To enjoy life to the fullest, that is always the goal. To be able to do what you really want to do right now without feeling self-conscious. And without any guilty conscience or inhibitions. We enjoy more freedom today than ever before. And we can experience first hand that good taste is always attractive. This AXE fragrance, the most successful of all time was created for men with taste. The efficient AXE protection against body odor has been combined with a spectacular scent. Developed by some of the best fragrance experts in the world. Completely without aluminum, AXE Dark Temptation protects its wearer so effectively that he can concentrate fully on what he wants to do. The sensually distinctive scent of AXE Dark Temptation is built on an intense relationship between masculine spiciness and beguiling sweetness. The base note is hot chocolate, amber and patchouli with nuances of cherry, whipped cream, pepper and ginger. Coriander, black basil and sage round off the fragrance and make the pleasure perfect. AXE Dark Temptation Roll-On is extremely economical. A single roll in the armpits is completely sufficient. AXE Dark Temptation is the effective body spray with the sensational scent that invites you to enjoy life to the fullest.

remarks.value: WARNHINWEISE: Aus nicht weniger als 15 cm Entfernung sprühen. Nicht auf gereizter oder verletzter Haut anwenden. Bei Auftreten von Hautirritationen nicht weiter verwenden. Direktes Einatmen vermeiden. Nur kurz sprühen und in gut gelüfteten Räumen verwenden, längeres Sprühen vermeiden. Kontakt mit Augen und Intimbereich vermeiden. Benutzung ausschließlich gemäß Verwendungszweck. Nur entleert entsorgen.
